original_text: Michal took an image and laid it on the bed and put a pillow of goats' hair at its head and covered it with the clothes.
korean_text: 미갈이 우상을 가져다가 침상에 누이고 염소 털로 엮은 것을 그 머리에 씌우고 의복으로 그것을 덮었더니

sentences.original_text: and laid it on the bed
and put a pillow of goats' hair at its head
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 머리에 염소 털 베개를 놓았습니다

sentences.original_text: and covered it with the clothes
